info.name: Travel Agency API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Travel Agency Management System with comprehensive validation rules and office location support.

## Key Features:
- **Office Location Support**: New location field accepts Google Maps links, coordinates, or descriptions
- **Comprehensive Validation**: All endpoints include detailed validation rules
- **Role-based Access**: SuperAdmin, Admin, and Agent roles with proper permissions
- **Populated Responses**: All responses include related data (office info, agent info, etc.)

## Authentication:
- Use login endpoints to get JWT tokens
- Include `Authorization: Bearer {token}` header in protected requests
- Tokens include user role and office information

## Office Location Examples:
- Google Maps: `https://maps.google.com/maps?q=123+Main+St`
- Coordinates: `40.7128,-74.0060`
- Description: `Downtown Office Building, Floor 5`

body.description:
**Validation Rules:**
- `email`: Required, valid email format
- `password`: Required, minimum 6 characters

**Response includes:**
- User data with populated office information (name, address, location)
- Access token
- Refresh token

**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Optional, 2-100 characters
- `phone`: Optional, valid phone format (regex: /^[\+]?[1-9][\d]{0,15}$/)

**Response includes:**
- Updated user data with populated office information (name, address, location)

**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `address`: Required, 5-500 characters  
- `location`: Optional, max 1000 characters. Accepts:
  - Google Maps links (https://...)
  - Coordinates (latitude,longitude)
  - Location descriptions

**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Optional, 2-100 characters
- `address`: Optional, 5-500 characters
- `location`: Optional, max 1000 characters. Accepts:
  - Google Maps links (https://...)
  - Coordinates (latitude,longitude) 
  - Location descriptions
  - Empty string to remove location

**Example with coordinates:**
- `location`: Latitude,longitude format
- Useful for map integrations and GPS systems

**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `address`: Required, 5-500 characters
- `location`: Optional, max 1000 characters

**Example with description:**
- `location`: Descriptive text for easy identification
- Useful when exact coordinates are not available

**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `address`: Required, 5-500 characters
- `location`: Optional, max 1000 characters

**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `email`: Required, valid email format, unique
- `password`: Required, minimum 6 characters
- `role`: Required, one of: 'SuperAdmin', 'Admin', 'Agent'
- `officeId`: Required for Admin/Agent roles, valid MongoDB ObjectId
- `phone`: Optional, valid phone format (regex: /^[\+]?[1-9][\d]{0,15}$/)

**Response includes:**
- Created agent data with populated office information (name, address, location)

**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `email`: Required, valid email format, unique
- `password`: Required, minimum 6 characters
- `phone`: Optional, valid phone format (regex: /^[\+]?[1-9][\d]{0,15}$/)
- `dateOfBirth`: Optional, valid date format (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `nationality`: Optional, 2-100 characters
- `passportNumber`: Optional, 5-50 characters
- `officeId`: Auto-assigned based on agent's office (for Agent role)
- `agentId`: Auto-assigned to current user (for Agent role)

**Response includes:**
- Created student data with populated office and agent information

body.description:
**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Required, 2-200 characters
- `university`: Required, 2-200 characters
- `department`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `country`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `city`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `intake`: Required, 1-50 characters
- `isPrivate`: Required, either 'Yes' or 'No'
- `type`: Required, 2-50 characters
- `fee`: Required, 1-50 characters
- `timePeriod`: Required, 1-50 characters
- `percentageRequirement`: Required, 1-10 characters
- `cgpaRequirement`: Required, 1-10 characters

**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Required, 2-200 characters
- `university`: Required, 2-200 characters
- `department`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `country`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `city`: Required, 2-100 characters
- `intake`: Required, 1-50 characters
- `isPrivate`: Required, either 'Yes' or 'No'
- `type`: Required, 2-50 characters
- `fee`: Required, 1-50 characters
- `timePeriod`: Required, 1-50 characters
- `percentageRequirement`: Required, 1-10 characters
- `cgpaRequirement`: Required, 1-10 characters

**Validation Rules:**
- `name`: Optional, 2-200 characters
- `university`: Optional, 2-200 characters
- `department`: Optional, 2-100 characters
- `country`: Optional, 2-100 characters
- `city`: Optional, 2-100 characters
- `intake`: Optional, 1-50 characters
- `isPrivate`: Optional, either 'Yes' or 'No'
- `type`: Optional, 2-50 characters
- `fee`: Optional, 1-50 characters
- `timePeriod`: Optional, 1-50 characters
- `percentageRequirement`: Optional, 1-10 characters
- `cgpaRequirement`: Optional, 1-10 characters
- `isActive`: Optional, boolean

**Validation Rules:**
- `studentId`: Required, valid MongoDB ObjectId
- `amount`: Required, positive number
- `date`: Required, valid date format (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `paymentMethod`: Required, one of: 'cash', 'card', 'bank_transfer', 'check', 'other'
- `notes`: Optional, max 500 characters
- `receiptNumber`: Optional, 5-50 characters (auto-generated if not provided)

**Response includes:**
- Created payment data with populated student information

**Validation Rules:**
- `officeId`: Required, valid MongoDB ObjectId
- `agentId`: Required, valid MongoDB ObjectId
- `message`: Required, 5-1000 characters
- `title`: Required, 2-200 characters
- `type`: Required, one of: 'info', 'success', 'warning', 'error', 'payment', 'student', 'system'
- `priority`: Optional, one of: 'low', 'medium', 'high', 'urgent' (default: medium)
- `expiresAt`: Optional, valid date format (YYYY-MM-DD)

**Response includes:**
- Created notification data
